items.title: System Architect - 50% Remote - Brussels, Belgium - Fluent English - I
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=8, c=14, mobile=2, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=1, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=16, frontend=0}
items.content:
System Architect - 50% Remote - Brussels, Belgium - Fluent English - Immediate Start - 70 - 90 EUR/hr

Job Requirements

A successful candidate will be flexible, with a variety of software development skills and a commitment to extend the breadth and depth of their knowledge. years' experience in electronic design is a plus.

Essential Skills & Experience:

Experience of software profiling, instrumentation and optimization

Strong understanding of complex multi-component systems

Proficiency with optimizing applications, workloads, and compilers

Expert knowledge of C or C++ development

Understanding of how to rigorously test software and design software for test

Experience of the software life cycle has taken complex software from concept, to production and maintenance

Strong interpersonal and communication skills Excellent written and spoken English; can write coherent documentation; can influence and build consensus

Ability to work independently and in a distributed team

Ability to work face to face with key partners and their internal development programs

Professional and enthusiastic approach to work

Flair for lateral thinking and problem solving

Pro-active and self-motivated

Willingness to be flexible and accept new challenges

Desirable Skills & Experience:

Knowledge of Arm based computer Architecture

Demonstrable low-level device driver development or integration experience

Experience with Android, ChomeOS or Windows software and systems

Experience with Linux, Linux distributions, Cloud/Edge applications and networking software

Knowledge of multimedia system designs involving GPUs, compositing display processors and image signal processing

Familiarity with System-on-a-Chip architectures

An understanding of Embedded power management techniques and security technologies.

items.content:
Emurgo (https://emurgo.io) Software Engineer, Full stack | Remote | full-time, Onsite | https://emurgo.breezy.hr/p/f2522c38b22f01-software-engineer?...

Cardano is a 3rd generation blockchain platform with more advanced features than any protocol yet developed, and the first one to evolve out of a scientific philosophy, where feature development is driven by scientific peer reviewed white papers.

Emurgo is its venture arm, but we also develop projects for the Cardano blockchain -- we embrace open source :) https://github.com/Emurgo

We're looking for:- Devs with a strong CS background- Lots of interest to learn about crypto

If you have questions, feel free to write to me nicolas at emurgo.io

items.title: Sense https://sense.com | Multiple Positions | Cambridge, MA | Onsite & Remote | Full-time ...
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=4, other=10, dotnet=16, c=16, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=68, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=96, frontend=0}
items.content:
Sense https://sense.com | Multiple Positions | Cambridge, MA | Onsite & Remote | Full-time

Sense is trying to make a difference in climate change by making an engaging product which changes your relationship to your home. Get insights into how your appliances use energy, know what's on without smart appliances or IoT hubs, get alerts or automate your home if you like, or just sit back and save some money and energy.

We have an incredibly productive cross-functional technology team, doing nearly everything in-house: electrical & mechanical engineering, embedded linux, DSP, cloud backend, data science and machine learning, mobile and full-stack web. This means there's incredible opportunities for personal growth. Basically anything you're interested in learning about, there are experts in-house.

Sound interesting? Join our team:

* Embedded Software Engineer (Rust/C/Python)

* Product Manager

* Engineering Manager

* Community and Social Media Manager

https://sense.workable.com/

Touch base with me (jonah at sense․com) if you want to chat about any of these positions. I'm currently spending my time working on our embedded platform, from linux drivers through DSP, data science through cloud connectivity, but I can put you in touch with folks from other areas of the stack if you want to learn more.

No recruiters.

items.content:
SEEKING FREELANCER | Paris | Remote welcome. Local possible.

Looking for a developer that can write ASM (assembly) code for ARM (we have needs for x86 too); the work is mostly NEON code.

Previous experience doing those things is a requirement, though.

Email: jb -- videolan.org

items.title: Verification Engineer - ASAP Start - Remote Work!
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=16, frontend=0}
items.content:
My Munich based client is urgently searching for 3 Verification Engineers with Specman experience to come on board for a 6 month project starting ASAP - whilst they are based in Munich they have expressed that for the right candidate they would be open to an element of remote work.

We are looking to fill this position ASAP, as such this position is a 1 stage Skype interview which will be held next week.

Requirements:

  • Good knowledge of:
    • UVM/OVM
    • Verilog/System Verilog
    • VHDL
  • Specman (language e) experience would be hugely beneficial

items.title: Duck Creek Developer (Remote Opportunity)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=1, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=8, frontend=0}
items.content:
HTC A brief profile

Established in 1990, HTC Inc., a CMM Level 5 company with headquarters in Troy, Michigan, is a leading global Information Technology solution and BPO provider. HTC assists clients across multiple industry verticals, offering turnkey project lifecycle in, e-business, data warehousing, embedded systems, ECM, SCM, CRM, and ERP solutions. HTC Inc. offers ConnectIT, our Global Delivery Methodology that enables seamlessly delivery of outsourced IT services. HTC has global delivery centers across the globe.

About the Job

We are currently looking for Duck Creek Developer (Policy, Billing, Claims).

Locations: GA, CA and/or Remote.

Experience in Policy or Billing or Claims. Opportunities in all DC modules.

Requirement:

  • Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in developing applications using Duck creek platform.
  • Experience with v7.x and/or On-Demand.
  • Strong knowledge of Agile development methodologies including some of the following: Scrum, Kanban, Lean, Test-driven development, and Behavior-driven development preferred.
  • Experience with Duck Creek Billing Application is required
Team player that puts the success of the team ahead of their personal success. Shows concern for quality in their work and practices continuous improvement. Interacts professionally, appropriately and courteously with co-workers. Experience with systems integration.

Benefits:

HTC s competitive package includes besides compensation Health, Dental, Vision, Disability Cover, both Short and Long term, Life Insurance, Flexible Spending, 401k and Paid Vacation

Candidates should e-mail their resumes to

Be sure to reference the job number and title in the subject line. Relevant degree or its foreign equivalent is required. EEO/M/F/V/H

- provided by Dice

items.title: Embedded Software Developer (f/m/d) full-time remote at Proemion (Fulda, Deutschland)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=17, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=80, frontend=0}
items.content:
Embedded Software Developer (f/m/d) full-time remote

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Embedded Developer
Industry: Cloud Services, Internet of Things, Telematics
Company size: 51–200 people
Company type: Private
Company: Proemion | Fulda, Deutschland

Remote details

Preferred Timezone: (GMT+01:00) Berlin +/- 4 hours
Office Location: Fulda, Deutschland. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

c
embedded
stm32
git
can-bus

Job description

Join a well-established (30+ years) telematics company to deliver a new generation of our data processing pipeline and analytics tools.

Proemion is at the forefront of the IoT/Telematics revolution and is looking for an Embedded Software Engineer (f/m/d) 32-bit Microcontroller Firmware Development at the earliest possible date for our headquarters in Fulda (relocation support offered) or full-time remote.

Your Role

  • Build robust microcontroller-based software that will be used in a variety of embedded applications including mobile and stationary industrial machinery
  • Assurance of technical standards and documentation compliance
  • Product development in a creative, agile environment in close cooperation with our Software Architect

Your Skills

  • You are an expert developer with a minimum of five years intensive programming experience in C (design and programming)
  • You love challenges and take responsibility for development and process quality
  • Experience in designing and developing Embedded Systems based on 32-bit microcontrollers (strongly desired)
  • Experience with git, CAN and development on STM32 microcontrollers (desired)Initiative, creativity, analytical skills, team spirit and the ability to work independently
Apply now

About Proemion

Our Offer

  • Independent work in a performance-oriented and challenging atmosphere
  • Short lines of communication and flat hierarchies foster an open working environment
  • Modern premises right in the middle of Germany featuring lounge, kicker-table, pool table, team events, additional allowance for “Fitness Insel” and childcare, flextime and further amenities

Ready for the challenge?

We look forward to your application via our career portal career.proemion.com or via e-mail career(at)proemion.com.

Let’s build something great together!

With your application you agree to the collection, use and processing of your personal data by Proemion GmbH for the purpose of recruitment in accordance with our corresponding Privacy Policy (https://career.proemion.com/en/jobs/application/privacy-policy.html).

Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Billiard table
  • Mentoring programm
  • Modern development environment
  • Team events
  • Sport sponsoring
  • Flexible working times
  • Free soft drinks, fruit and cereals at our headquarter in Fulda
  • Home office option
  • Periodic face-to-face meetings with the team

items.content:
My clients based in Lörrach Germany, are currently in growth mode and looking to expand dramatically and looking to bring on multiple experienced Embedded software developers. They specialize in the E-Mobility sector developing power transfer tech systems that chat electrically moving objects.

Requirements 5+ years:

  • Embedded software development
  • Eclipse or Git
  • Basic knowledge of UML
  • CAN bus or Ethernet
  • Embedded Linux and TI microcontrollers
  • Knowledge of Power electronics development

Please note, you must have past professional experience with the related technology and also full and existing working permissions for freelance work in Europe. Applications from those who do not hold existing full working permissions for freelance work in Germany cannot be considered.
